video:video.video:title: Metaenga Platform Preview
video:video.video:description: In the video, initially, an XR platform administrator assigns a training session to a worker. The worker receives a notification-reminder on their phone about the need to undergo the training. Subsequently, the worker puts on VR glasses. The video then transitions to scenes from the training itself, where the worker interacts with an electrical panel using a multimeter. Finally, the administrator on the platform reviews the completion results, along with statistics for all employees, and so on.

video:video.video:title: Make deploying VR training on-site effortless
video:video.video:description: This video vividly demonstrates how to make deploying VR training on-site effortless. It highlights the ease of uploading content onto devices, managing devices from an admin panel, and measuring training outcomes. The video showcases a streamlined process for setting up and conducting VR training, emphasizing the simplicity and efficiency of the system for both administrators and users.

video:video.video:title: Make deploying VR training on-site effortless
video:video.video:description: This video vividly demonstrates how to make deploying VR training on-site effortless. It highlights the ease of uploading content onto devices, managing devices from an admin panel, and measuring training outcomes. The video showcases a streamlined process for setting up and conducting VR training, emphasizing the simplicity and efficiency of the system for both administrators and users.

video:video.video:title: Run your fleet of VR headsets
video:video.video:description: Efficiently run your fleet of VR headsets with this comprehensive management solution. The video demonstrates how to easily set up VR devices, configure settings, upload content remotely, manage access, and monitor your inventory. It emphasizes the convenience and control you have over your VR equipment, ensuring that each headset is optimally utilized and maintained for maximum efficiency and user experience.

video:video.video:title: Streamline XR content, users and teams
video:video.video:description: Streamline XR content, users, and teams by scaling knowledge flexibly. This approach involves instantly distributing immersive content and efficiently managing users, teams, and headsets across your organization. The video will showcase how this streamlined process facilitates the widespread dissemination of educational and training material, ensuring a cohesive and efficient learning experience within a corporate environment.

video:video.video:title: Assign XR training on a limitless scale
video:video.video:description: In the video, we demonstrate the capability to assign training sessions both to teams and individual users. This feature allows for flexible and targeted training experiences, catering to the specific needs of each user or group.

video:video.video:title: Explore results, boost productivity
video:video.video:description: Discover results and enhance productivity with real-time, AI-powered performance tracking and reporting. This approach offers valuable insights into employee development, helping to identify areas for improvement and opportunities for growth.

video:video.video:title: VR Classrooms for group sessions
video:video.video:description: VR Classrooms for Group Sessions: Gain complete control over 360-degree group training sessions with the capability for remote video playback and synchronized streaming. This feature enhances the group learning experience by ensuring all participants are engaged and in sync during the training.

video:video.video:title: VR Training: High Voltage Electrical Substation Tour
video:video.video:description: Explore immersive VR simulations for electrical safety training. Experience XR training programs for high-voltage scenarios. Enhance skills in a virtual reality environment

video:video.video:title: Occupational Safety and Health Training
video:video.video:description: This VR Safety Training is dedicated to such important topics as maintaining safety at the workplace, helping employees to eliminate hazardous conditions and avoiding them by following the OSHA 1910.269 standards requirements.

video:video.video:title: Transformer Oil Sampling Training
video:video.video:description: Through the training, attendees are given a task to perform a preventive maintenance procedure — transformer oil sampling. Participants are invited to collect the necessary tools and step-by-step carry out the sampling procedure for transformer oil of voltage class 110 kV

video:video.video:title: Substation Transformer Isolation Training
video:video.video:description: Delve into VR training focused on the detailed procedures of medium voltage substation transformer isolation and Lockout-Tagout (LOTO) procedures.

video:video.video:title: VR Training: High Voltage Electrical Substation Tour
video:video.video:description: Explore immersive VR simulations for electrical safety training. Experience XR training programs for high-voltage scenarios. Enhance skills in a virtual reality environment

video:video.video:title: VR Training: Transformer Oil Sampling
video:video.video:description: Through the training, attendees are given a task to perform a preventive maintenance procedure — transformer oil sampling. Participants are invited to collect the necessary tools and step-by-step carry out the sampling procedure for transformer oil of voltage class 110 kV

video:video.video:title: VR Training: Feeder Protection Relay
video:video.video:description: The participants are able to configure a Feeder protection relay based on the ABB REF615 device
